item.title: Give way sign hit by reversing lorry, 1st November
item.description:
Give way sign just outside of the star college was bit twice by a reversing articulated HGV reg: DK70 ZKA, on Friday 31st around 10:19 after the driver came upon an obstruction and attempted to turn around using the cross junction, Struck the sign, exited the vehicle, looked at the sign then got back in and continued maneuvering and drove off

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ullenwood Manor Lane, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: Dumped dining chair & sofa cushions, 1st November
item.description:

item.title: Stretch of several street lights, 31st October
item.description:
A stretch of several street lights are out from Fairmont street to the A435 roundabout. Also a couple out on stoke road. It’s pitch black and very unsafe for pedestrians.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Orchard Road, Bishop's Cleeve
